a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of pregnant women who have anemia, 2000 to 2019
Prevalence of anemia in pregnant women, measured as the percentage of pregnant women with a hemoglobin
level less than 110 grams per liter at sea level.
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024)
